poem:
Title: The Bear of Northern Solace

In the still morning of Slovakia's north,
A drone met a bear and the bear went forth.
Through town, he roamed and caused dismay,
With a wild, untamed narrative to convey.
A beastly echo of distant wilderness,
To dispel silence with his fierce impress.
Unto those he harmed, may time repair,
In the quiet echo of the silenced bear.
